--------------------
Text: Berberomeloe is a genus within the tribe Lyttini of the family Meloidae, the oil or blister beetles.
Triplets:<Berberomeloe
1:
--------------------
Text: Berberomeloe:  It includes two species, the red-striped oil beetle, "Berberomeloe majalis", and the less flamboyant "Berberomeloe insignis".
Triplets:<Berberomeloe
3:
--------------------
Text: Berberomeloe:  As Bologna notes, it had long been known that the larval development of the red-stripted oil beetle was very different from that of most species placed in "Meloe", so that some authors treated it within the Lyttini genus "Trichomeloe".
Triplets:<Berberomeloe
8:
--------------------
Text: Berberomeloe:  Individuals of this type differed from typical "B. majalis" in several anatomical characteristics, and hence García-Paris argued that they should be given species status and should also be placed in "Berberomeloe".
Triplets:<Berberomeloe
